name: In/Visible Talks
description: This creative conference focuses on design practitioners having candid conversations and sharing real-life experiences. Speakers will be covering topics such as, “Design No Harm: Why Humility is Essential in the Journey Toward Equity,” and “Bring Your Whole Self to Work: How Your Purpose Drives Impact.”

name: DesignTO
description: Hosting independent projects, such as exhibitions, events (e.g. tours, talks, workshops), and window installations that are wholly created and executed by an individual or organization. A venue-designer matchmaking program if you’d prefer to collaborate with a host organization. DesignTO Projects, which are either open by invitation or submission to the festival.
